posts.post_content:
Looking for a crease free card with decent centering and good color. I can’t afford the green (or rare backs) but open to the other 3. PayPal ready. Email [url]adamwanaselja@gmail.com[/url] pics/prices. 

I’ve been moving my modern cards to make room for this. Really excited to finally add a Cobb to my PC. 

Thanks.

I have a Red Portrait in a SGC 40,,,3100.00 asking price Polar Bear back...has tobacco stains like all Polar Bear should have or they would be bleached..it will sell 1st day offered...all PSA 3 and  SGC 40 are all listed over 4k...we'll talk
